sourcesContent: {{forms.nombre}} {{forms.apellido1}} import { Component,OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { formService } from 'src/app/services/formServices'; @Component({ selector: 'app-products', templateUrl: './products.component.html', styleUrls: ['./products.component.css'] }) export class ProductsComponent { forms: Formz[] =[ ]; formName:any=""; formApellido1:any=""; constructor(private FormService:formService){} ngOnInit():void { this.FormService.sendFormulario(this.formName, this.formApellido1 ).subscribe((forms:Formz[]) =>{ this.forms = forms; }); } }export interface Formz { nombre: string; apellido1: string;}
